title: Blow's Smoke
description: The woman I loved vanished in thin air, and I'll do anything to get her back.BlowI ran the only woman who ever held my heart out of town. I did what I needed to protect her, but that doesn't mean I’m not pissed. I figured she’d stick close because of her family, but no, she ran away. From me, her family, and those who care for her here.Now having heard the news from Grinder, I’ll stop at nothing to make things right. She’s mine and it doesn't matter if she likes it or not. I’m bringing her home and showing her that I mean what I say. I won’t back down and let her go again.Not even when the ghost from the past comes back to haunt us both.
author: E.C. Land
